TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Indkøb af 6 metro-vognsæt (Kontrakt til levering og vedligeholdelse)
EBWE - Beschaffung von 6 U-Bahn-Wagensets (Liefer- und Wartungsvertrag)
EBRD - Procurement of 6 metro car sets (Supply and Maintenance Contract)
BERD - Adquisición de 6 conjuntos de coches de metro (Contrato de suministro y mantenimiento)
EBRD - 6 metrovaunukokonaisuuden hankinta (toimitusta ja ylläpitoa koskeva sopimus)
BERD - Acquisition de 6 ensembles de wagons de métro (contrat de fourniture et de maintenance)
ΕΤΑΑ - Σύναψη σύμβασης για προμήθεια 6 καθισμάτων μετρό (σύμβαση προμήθειας και συντήρησης)
BERS - Fornitura di 6 set di vagoni della metropolitana (Appalto di fornitura e manutenzione)
EBWO - Aankoop van 6 stellen metrowagens (leverings- en onderhoudsopdracht)
BERD - Adjudicação de 6 conjuntos de metropolitanos (Contrato de fornecimento e manutenção)
EBRD - Anskaffning av 6 uppsättningar av tunnelbanevagnar (leverans- och underhållskontrakt)
EBOR - Zakoupení 6 souprav vozidel metra (zakázka na dodávky a údržbu)
EBRD - 6 metroovagunikomplekti hange (tarne- ja hooldusleping)
EBRD - 6 metrókocsi beszerzése (beszerzési és karbantartási szerződés)
ERPB - 6 metro vagonų komplektų įsigijimas (pirkimo ir priežiūros sutartis)
ERAB - 6 metro vagonu komplektu iepirkums (piegādes un uzturēšanas līgums)
BERŻ - L-akkwist ta' 6 settijiet ta' karozzi metro (Kuntratt ta' Provvista Manutenzjoni)
EBOR - Nabycie 6 zestawów wagonów kolei podziemnej (umowa na dostawę i konserwację)
EBOR - Obstaranie 6 vlakových súprav metra (Zmluva o dodávke a údržbe)
EBOR - Naročilo 6 sklopov podzemne železnice (naročilo blaga in vzdrževanja)
EBRD - Soláthar 6 thacar carranna meitreo (conradh soláthair agus cothabhála)
ЕБВР - Обществена поръчка за 6 комплекта метро вагони (Поръчка за доставка и поддръжка)
BERD - Achiziționarea a 6 seturi de vagoane de metrou (Contract de furnizare și întreținere)
EBRD - Nabava 6 kompleta podzemnih vozila (ugovor o nabavi i održavanju)

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Indkøb af 6 metro-vognsæt (Kontrakt til levering og vedligeholdelse) (EG-Kairo)

CONTENTS.P: Procurement Reference: 9033-GPN-46875
Project name: Cairo Metro
Country: Egypt
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental Infrastructure
Project ID: 46875
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 22.3.2018
Closing date: 22.3.2019, 24:00 Cairo time

The Government of Egypt represented by the Ministry of Transport (MOT), have applied for the loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) to improve the quality of public transport in the City of Cairo. The executing agency for this project will be the National Authority for Tunnels (NAT).
The amount of loan will be 100 000 000 EUR which will be used for procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— Procurement of 6 metro car sets (supply and maintenance contract).
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the EBRD will be tendered in accordance with the EBRD’s procurement policies and rules. The proceeds of the EBRD loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Purchaser’s country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Maj. Gen. Eng. A. M. Nagdy, Ramses Building, Ramses Square,

TI_DOC.P: EBWE - Beschaffung von 6 U-Bahn-Wagensets (Liefer- und Wartungsvertrag) (EG-Kairo)

Issue date: 22.3.2018
Closing date: 22.3.2019, 24:00 Cairo time

The Government of Egypt represented by the Ministry of Transport (MOT), have applied for the loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) to improve the quality of public transport in the City of Cairo. The executing agency for this project will be the National Authority for Tunnels (NAT).
The amount of loan will be 100 000 000 EUR which will be used for procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— Procurement of 6 metro car sets (supply and maintenance contract).
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the EBRD will be tendered in accordance with the EBRD’s procurement policies and rules. The proceeds of the EBRD loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Purchaser’s country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Maj. Gen. Eng. A. M. Nagdy, Ramses Building, Ramses Square,

TI_DOC.P: EBOR - Nabycie 6 zestawów wagonów kolei podziemnej (umowa na dostawę i konserwację) (EG-Kair)
